table_caption: Participants. Controls and TLE characteristics (2nd and 3rd columns) and the three cognitive phenotype groups (4th through 6th columns). Generalized Cognitive Impairment (Generalized-CI), Focal Cognitive Impairment (Focal-CI) and No Cognitive Impairment (No-CI) – refer to TLE patient subgroups identified through the clustering analysis in Section 2.3.1. †Based on adjusted hippocampal z-score of <−1.5. If based on z < −1.0, 43% of TLE exhibited hippocampal atrophy. ‡One value missing from Generalized-CI. Please see text for interpretation of significant differences. (last column).
